name: People of the Springs
desc: One of the six tribes of Natlan, also known as Meztli. They are cheerful, kind people, lovers of music, gatherings, and hot springs. The tribe lives alongside the Koholasaurs.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>August 17, 2024</color>
The warriors in the Stadium of the Sacred Flame are about to enter the fray.
While waiting for the competition to begin,
Why not take some time to listen to our three friends share the various facets of their tribal lives?
<color=#ff9999>YouTube:</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 28, 2024</color>
You'll run into all kinds of Saurians during your adventures here in Natlan.
Journey alongside the Saurians and immerse yourself in the breathtaking vistas of Natlan.
<color=#ff9999>YouTube:</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 18, 2024</color>
Hello, Traveler!
Do you enjoy soaking in hot springs? If so, don't miss out on the "People of the Springs"! They have the best vacation spot, so let's learn more about them!

customize.name: Tupac
customize.desc: A giant from the People of the Springs and one of the six heroes of Natlan with the Ancient Name He died during the Cataclysm 500 years ago.

customize.text: Giant and hero of the tribe. He had an Ancient Name

customize.name: Amina
customize.desc: Chief of the People of the Springs.

customize.name: Mualani
customize.desc: A well-known guide in Natlan who owns a watersports shop, and expert in all forms of wave-chasing.

customize.text:
Tribal guide. She is a hero of the People of the Springs, who has been acknowledged by her Ancient Name
Atea
Tribal warrior, who was wounded in the fight with the Abyss. She died because of her injuries.

customize.name: Toyac Springs
customize.desc: The tribe who lives alongside the Koholasaurs, known as the "People of the Springs," renowned for their hot springs and relaxing music. Among all the tribes, this is the most popular among visitors from afar.

customize.name: Koholasaurus
customize.desc:
A Saurian with thick, strong flippers and a long tail that can swim in water and liquid phlogiston.
According to legend, more ancient dragons were even more able to adapt to their environments, and when the largest dragon in the ocean of the age floated on the surface, it could even be mistaken for an island. It is said that today's Koholasaurus are the descendants of that great sea dragon, and in their broad backs the colossal forms of those ancient sea beasts may yet be glimpsed.

customize.name: Koholasaur Whelp
customize.desc:
A young Koholasaurus with the ability to swim through water and liquid phlogiston.
Their skin and flippers are still soft and tender, to the point that they can't even tolerate hot environments for long periods like adults. However, one day, they will grow into the form that can swim freely through the water.

customize.name: Surf's Up
customize.desc: A commemorative item originally reserved for the champion of the "First All-Tribe Surfing Championship." Since said tournament is currently in the preparatory stage, the prize is in temporary storage at the Leisurely Puffer, with the shop owner as its custodian.

customize.name: Waveriding Whirl
customize.desc: A boomerang made from the fangs of a giant sea serpent. It was a rare weapon indeed that the giant Tupac would call "trusty."

customize.name: Ash-Graven Drinking Horn
customize.desc: A ritual vessel passed down amongst the Meztli. They say that this was once a treasure much-valued, yet never used, by the hero "Giant" Tupac.

customize.name: Footprint of the Rainbow
customize.desc: A keen polearm forged from jade. It gives off rainbow-hued light when exposed to sunlight.

customize.name: Talking Stick
customize.desc: Most people will find this obsidian-inlaid club quite convincing indeed.

customize.name: Scroll of the Hero of Cinder City
Azure Obsidian Ring
customize.desc: An obsidian ring with engraved patterns styled like those of the People of the Springs. It is an ancient medium by which the tribe established contact with the deep night. Perhaps its strength can allow you to cross the boundary between this place and a certain other location...

customize.name: "People of the Springs" Reputation EXP
customize.desc: Increases your Tribe Reputation Lv. (People of the Springs)

customize.name: Hot Spring O'Clock
customize.desc: A pizza made using Grainfruit. Grainfruit is scattered across the crust before a thick layer of cheese is poured on top, and the whole thing is delivered into the oven. The final touch is to then draw a little Koholasaurus picture on it. Eat it while it's hot — the warmth will remind you of a serene time spent enjoying a soothing soak in a hot spring.

galleryCharacter.key: Home of Hot Springs and Flowing Waters

imgDesc.text: The tribe who lives alongside the Koholasaurs, known as the "People of the Springs," renowned for their hot springs and relaxing music. Among all the tribes, this is the most popular among visitors from afar.
